Uses of Class
com.parkingtycoon.controllers.BaseController

  • Packages that use BaseController 
    Package Description
    com.parkingtycoon.controllers  
    com.parkingtycoon.controllers.ui  

    • Uses of BaseController in com.parkingtycoon.controllers

      Subclasses of BaseController in com.parkingtycoon.controllers 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AnimatedSpritesController
      This class is responsible for loading Animated Sprite Data from JSON files to usable AnimatedSpriteModels.
      class  BluePrintsController
      The responsibility of this controller is to build and demolish buildings using the information of the BluePrints and the input of the player.
      class  CarQueuesController
      This class is responsible for adding and sending cars to an appropriate queue.
      class  CarsController
      This class is responsible for controlling the Cars in the simulation.
      class  ElevatorsController
      This controller is responsible for processing cars through elevators.
      class  EntrancesController
      This class is responsible for providing a Queue that processes the new Cars that would like to park.
      class  ExitsController
      This class is responsible for providing a Queue that processes the Cars that would like to leave the park.
      class  FinancialController
      This class is responsible for processing the money of the player.
      class  FloorsController
      This class is responsible for providing multiple floors of te simulation world.
      class  InputController
      This Class is responsible for processing user input like keyboard and mouse input that are applied to the GameWindow
      class  PathFollowersController<T extends PathFollowerModel>
      This class is responsible for making PathFollowers follow a path, using goals and elevators.
      class  RenderController
      This Class is responsible for enabling Views to be called every frame.
      class  SimulationController
      This Class is responsible for enabling Controllers to be called multiple times per frame depending on the speed of the simulation.
      class  TimeController
      This Class is responsible for enabling Controllers to be called every time when a amount of in game time has passes.
      class  UpdatableController
      This Class provides help to the Update loop to force only Controllers to be registrable.

    • Uses of BaseController in com.parkingtycoon.controllers.ui

      Subclasses of BaseController in com.parkingtycoon.controllers.ui 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HudBuildController
      This Class is responsible for processing the user requests in the build window.
      class  HudCarsController
      This Class is responsible for processing the user requests in the Cars window.
      class  HudDiagramsController
      This Controller is responsible for setting up diagrams
      class  HudSettingsController
      This Class is responsible for processing the user requests in the Settings window.
      class  HudStatsController
      This class is responsible for controlling the UI that allows the game to have stats.
      class  HudTopController
      This class is responsible for the UI that changes the game.
